params.name: id
params.description: the id of the scheduled event

params.name: guild_id
params.description: the guild id which the scheduled event belongs to

params.name: channel_id
params.description: the channel id in which the scheduled event will be hosted, or `null` if [scheduled entity type](#DOCS_RESOURCES_GUILD_SCHEDULED_EVENT/guild-scheduled-event-object-guild-scheduled-event-entity-types) is `EXTERNAL`

params.name: creator_id
params.description: the id of the user that created the scheduled event *

params.name: name
params.description: the name of the scheduled event (1-100 characters)

params.name: description
params.description: the description of the scheduled event (1-1000 characters)

params.name: scheduled_start_time
params.description: the time the scheduled event will start

params.name: scheduled_end_time
params.description: the time the scheduled event will end, required if entity_type is `EXTERNAL`

params.name: privacy_level
params.description: the privacy level of the scheduled event

params.name: status
params.description: the status of the scheduled event

params.name: entity_type
params.description: the type of the scheduled event

params.name: entity_id
params.description: the id of an entity associated with a guild scheduled event

params.name: entity_metadata
params.description: additional metadata for the guild scheduled event

params.name: creator
params.description: the user that created the scheduled event

params.name: user_count
params.description: the number of users subscribed to the scheduled event

params.name: image
params.description: the [cover image hash](#DOCS_REFERENCE/image-formatting) of the scheduled event

params.name: guild_scheduled_event_id
params.description: the scheduled event id which the user subscribed to

params.name: user
params.description: user which subscribed to an event

params.name: member
params.description: guild member data for this user for the guild which this event belongs to, if any
